Located in between Sagrada Familia and Park Guell, this restaurant offers the BEST vegetarian/vegan/overall healthiest lunch in Barcelona.  Fresh ingredients and fantastic ambience. The proprietor makes every dish himself on the spot.  He could easily be on Top Chef.  We ordered zucchini spaghetti, fresh pressed juice, and a veggie sandwich.  If you appreciate real food, do yourself a favor and take a stroll to Quinoa Bar.
